name: Man vs Scorpion (Kevin Lopez's)
description:
Wait... This isn't Tacos Locas! This is a scorpion den! :O

** Music created by:  Markositta#5352 (Discord)

**Art work created by: Elthen's Pixel Art Shop,  Kalann,  JPKG

Controls:

Arrow keys to move!

[Space] to transform when normal!

[Space] to punch when strong!

[Escape] to head back to the menu!
